topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/549bb8e663687249c52c0b00#post_549bb8e663687249c52c0b00
It just ain't christmas if I ain't full of rage. The Iraqi people have had more than enough shit shoveled onto them, can't the fucking universe give them a goddamn break? Even just a little breathing space but no...

Some crazy goddamned motherfucker has always got to be there, shitting on them in the name Allah because that is totally what any fucking god worth worshiping would want! More bloodshed brought onto folks who just want to be left alone to live their own goddamned lives!

I knew more than a few Iraqi citizens when I served. They were decent people whatever their faith and none of them ever did anything to deserve the monstrous evil of these "Islamic State" cocksucking shit piles.

I fucking saw some of them die and it was all for goddamned nothing.

Nothing.

These fucking animals take from the world, take from decent people and give nothing back. Fuck them. Fuck every last goddamn one of them.

some of those people were friends of mine.
